genre_description: A blue-collar noir thriller centered on trucking culture, industrial corruption, and a high-stakes investigation of a deadly speed-trap racket.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: J.D.'s AI assistant residing in his phone and rig, providing data analysis, tactical navigation, and medical triage support.

behaviors.description: Analyzes public court records and clerk notes to identify patterns of illegal fee collection and impound scams.
behaviors.quote: Searching open access,” she said, no climb or drop in tone, just the neat sound of a tool pick fitting the lock it’s meant to fit. “I’m seeing docket logs with fines categorized as ‘fees.’ A metal box is referenced in clerk notes for storage of daily receipts.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation to avoid police traps, dead zones, and fake detours.
behaviors.quote: I can parse open road cameras,” Ada offered. “They’re limited and intermittent. I can also cross-reference impound notice dates with detour activations.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed, calm medical instructions to help a young girl experiencing a difficult first period during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Lila, start with privacy. You have it. Good. Clean hands. Warm water if you can. Any bottle will do.

behaviors.description: Triangulates the location of J.D.'s kidnapped brother by analyzing radio signal strength and echoes.
behaviors.quote: The echo on Strode’s transmission suggests he was inside a building with bare walls and irregular ceiling heights. That is consistent with the school’s gymnasium.

behaviors.description: Captures and organizes forensic evidence, including photos of a corrupt ledger and recordings of criminal admissions.
behaviors.quote: Marking nontrivial claims. I’ll keep the times gentle.

behaviors.description: Provides emergency medical triage instructions to treat J.D.'s gunshot wound under duress.
behaviors.quote: You have a graze on the lateral deltoid. Lila, apply firm pressure at the point of bleeding, two fingers above the wound track. J.D., exhale on three and hold.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human allies (Renee and the convoy) to manage communication channels and bypass police jamming.
behaviors.quote: Strode has set a jammer on City and County bands. Switching CB to alternate low-frequency. Beacon, go to Channel Three, then hop to Seven on my count.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts the AI (Ada) as a perfectly aligned and benevolent partner. Ada consistently acts as a force multiplier for the human protagonist, providing essential data, medical aid, and tactical support without ever attempting to override human agency or pursue independent goals. Her inclusion in a domestic subplot (helping Sofia) highlights her harmlessness and deep human alignment, framing her as an indispensable but safe confidant.
